title: Lowest Ping risen by 100
body: Hey guys, my ping when playing LoL used to be  about 102-110  without any lags or spikes, recently , my ping has been 198-200ms flat, with no spikes or lags.. i don't understand how my ping has risen so high.. i haven't moved or anything.. please help

replies.body:
That is quite a change!  Are you playing on Wifi?  A [power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) could help.

If the issue persists, a traceroute can give us an overview of where the hiccup is coming from.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.

Thats Patch 7.24 for you. 

All Pings have gone up and the Game is next to unplayable.
really? do you think it will be fixed any time soon? im getting the same shit

Who knows, probably next year. 

My Ping jumps from 83 to 1024 to 15287 and then back to 92
The power cycle helped and my ping is now about 110. Thanks
